snippet: By tackling a difficult corporate job while pregnant, Marissa Mayer, the new chief of Yahoo, is challenging the idea that senior executive ambitions and a woman's family life don't mix.
abstract: By tackling a difficult corporate job while pregnant, Marissa Mayer, the new chief of Yahoo, is challenging the idea that senior executive ambitions and a woman's family life don't mix.

headline.main: Yahoo Chief's Challenge? Corner Office, New Baby
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Chief’s Challenge? Corner Office, New Baby
